work.title: Internship - C# / Unity Developer
work.description:
Development of mobile games for events organized by professional clients, like BIL (a luxembourgish bank).
Worked on Augmented Reality & Virtual Reality applications and games.
Worked on databases, web applications and on the development of a REST API in order to create an environment where our projects could interact with each other.

work.title: Internship - C++ Developer
work.description:
Development of a project template builder GUI in C++, capable of building new projects a lot faster, adding other projects' code or submodules from Gitlab.
Development of a TV program module and a Translation module for a vocal assistant in C++
